content.prompt: In lines 5-6 (“And that . . . feet”), the speaker’s reference to the “dogs” has which effect on the development of the poem?

choices.label: It establishes the speaker’s credentials as an art historian.
It shows the speaker’s interest in insignificant details.
It reveals the speaker’s indifference toward the earl and the countess.
It highlights the speaker’s subjective interpretation of the tomb.

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how a narrator's reliability affects a narrative.
